about_the_game:
Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.

📸 Hop and Snap with Froggy Cam: Get ready to capture every moment of your frog-tastic journey with the revolutionary Froggy Cam! Immerse yourself in the action like never before by taking control of an in-game camera. Zoom, pan and snap adorable snapshots of your froggies as they bound through lush environments and conquer puzzling challenges.

🐸 Leap into Adventure: Embark on an unforgettable journey with 12 unique levels as you snap a group of adorable froggies through a series of photo challenges. From navigating lily pad mazes to solving puzzling obstacles, every leap brings new surprises!

🌿 Frog-tastic Environments: Explore vibrant and lush environments, each brimming with interactive elements and hidden secrets. Discover exotic flora, encounter different frogs, and uncover hidden pathways as you leap your way through this enchanting world.

🎯 Puzzle-solving Frolics: Put your wits to the test with a variety of brain-teasing puzzles and clever riddles. Strategically plan your shot, time your camera, and use the unique abilities to help each froggy to unlock new areas and overcome challenges.

🎵 Ribbiting Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the enchanting sounds of the froggy world, featuring a lively and catchy soundtrack that adds an extra layer of excitement to your gameplay.

🐸 Unleash your inner frog and get ready for a leap of a lifetime in Froggies at the Zoo! Are you ready to hop to it? 🐸

name: Froggies at the Zoo Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2GHz Processor Intel or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
